import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; import Iframe from 'react-iframe' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; const HeadofDepartment1 = () => { if (localStorage.getItem('access_token') === null){ return } return (
Head of Department | Fresherstrip

Head of Department

  • After the forms have been handed over to you by the School Officer, you'll head next to Your Head Of Department in the map below.

  • Note that the signing process is to be done accordingly.

  • Click View larger map in the map below then it will redirect you to either Google maps application or website and click on directions to direct you from where you are.

  • Make sure your device Location is turned on.

); } export default HeadofDepartment1;
